entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:19 PM MDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:19 PM MDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
